rows.title: Handwashing
rows.original: Good hand hygiene stops the passing of germs from person to person or from person to food or water
rows.text_introduction: Good hand hygiene stops the passing of germs from person to person or from person to food or water

rows.title: Safe Water Source
rows.original: Clean water saves money and improves health.  Making sure you collect water from a safe source is the start!
rows.text_introduction: Clean water saves money and improves health.  Making sure you collect water from a safe source is the start!

rows.title: Water Containers
rows.original: Keep strong with clean water.  Healthy homes have good water containers that are easy to use.
rows.text_introduction: Keep strong with clean water.  Healthy homes have good water containers that are easy to use.

rows.title: Water Treatment
rows.original: Never believe all water is safe to drink – always treat it.
rows.text_introduction: Never believe all water is safe to drink – always treat it.

rows.title: Clean Latrines
rows.original: A clean latrine means good hygiene. Good hygiene means diseases will not spread from a dirty latrine.
rows.text_introduction: A clean latrine means good hygiene.  A dirty one can mean disease.

rows.title: Healthy Homes
rows.original: A clean healthy home makes everyone happy. Clean healthy homes reduce your family’s risk of exposure to bacteria and diseases. A clean house is also less inviting to pests.
rows.text_introduction: A safe place to play is possible when your home and its surroundings are clean.  Clean for your family!

rows.title: Healthy Families
rows.original: With a clean place to stay, you and your family members can avoid various diseases, and therefore be very happy.
rows.text_introduction: Healthy habits can stop diarrhoea, diseases caused by worms and undernutrition.  Keep your family healthy.

rows.title: Menstrual Hygiene
rows.original: With good mentrual hygiene, girls can maintain their body hygiene and health. This gives them confidence and dignity. It also means that girls do not miss school during menstruation.
rows.text_introduction: With good menstrual hygiene girls can keep up their health.  Confident and with dignity, they shall not miss school during menstruation.

rows.title: Waste management
rows.original: Poor solid waste management could cause many problems including clogging of pipes and drainage systems and the creation of breeding sites for flies or insects which contribute to disease spread.
rows.text_introduction: Let's manage our waste!  It will mean a clean home and a healthy family.

rows.title: Safe Food
rows.original:
Food can become contaminated with germs and bacteria during slaughtering, while harvesting from the filed, during storage and transportation, and also while cooking.

By following good food hygiene practices, we can prevent food from becoming contaminated and causing food poisoning. This ensures families eat safe and healthy meals. refers to the conditions and measures necessary to ensure the safety of food from the moment you are cooking it to when you eat it.
rows.text_introduction: There are 5 keys to safe food.  Know what they are!

rows.title: Breastfeeding
rows.original: Breastfeeding is one of the most effective ways to ensure child health and survival. A safe, clean and healthy environment can help protect a mother and her child from many common childhood and maternal illnesses.
rows.text_introduction: Breastfeeding keeps your baby strong!  Clean water and safe food for the mother and other healthy habits are important.

rows.title: Bathing and Washing
rows.original: A clean healthy bathing place is relaxing and comfortable to use. (Sometimes, you can even sing while bathing!!)
rows.text_introduction: Wash often in a clean private bathing place (Sometimes, you can even sing while bathing!!)
